verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> to <S%H3898>eat<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> a <S%H4910>ruler,<s%> consider <S%H995>diligently<s%> <S%H995><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> thee:
And <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7915>knife<s%> to thy <S%H3930>throat,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> be a <S%H1167>man<s%> given to <S%H5315>appetite.<s%>
Be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H183>desirous<s%> of his <S%H4303>dainties:<s%> for <S%H1931>they<s%> are <S%H3577>deceitful<s%> <S%H3899>meat.<s%>
Labor <S%H3021><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> to be <S%H6238>rich:<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thine own <S%H998>wisdom.<s%>

Wilt thou <S%H5774>set<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon that which is <S%H369>not?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> riches certainly <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6213><s%> themselves <S%H3671>wings;<s%> they fly <S%H5774>away<s%> as an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

Eat <S%H3898><s%> thou <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of him that hath an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H183>desire<s%> thou his dainty meats: <S%H4303><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> he <S%H8176>thinketh<s%> in his <S%H5315>heart,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> is <S%H1931>he:<s%> <S%H398>Eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> he to thee; but his <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1077>not<s%> with <S%H5973>thee.<s%>
The <S%H6595>morsel<s%> which thou hast <S%H398>eaten<s%> shalt thou vomit <S%H6958>up,<s%> and <S%H7843>lose<s%> thy <S%H5273>sweet<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>
Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he will <S%H936>despise<s%> the <S%H7922>wisdom<s%> of thy <S%H4405>words.<s%>
Remove <S%H5253><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H1366>landmark;<s%> and <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> into the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the fatherless: <S%H3490><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> their <S%H1350>redeemer<s%> is <S%H2389>mighty;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H7378>plead<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H7379>cause<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee.
Apply <S%H935><s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> unto <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and thine <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>

Withhold <S%H4513><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%> from the <S%H4480>child:<s%> <S%H5288><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> if thou <S%H5221>beatest<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>
Thou <S%H859><s%> shalt <S%H5221>beat<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and shalt <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4480>hell.<s%> <S%H7585><s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H589>mine.<s%>
Yea, my <S%H3629>reins<s%> shall <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> when thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> right <S%H4339>things.<s%>

Let <S%H408>not<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7065>envy<s%> <S%H2400>sinners:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> be thou in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> an <S%H319>end;<s%> and thine <S%H8615>expectation<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> and <S%H833>guide<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
Be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> among <S%H5433>winebibbers;<s%> <S%H3196><s%> among riotous <S%H2151>eaters<s%> of flesh: <S%H1320><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H5433>drunkard<s%> and the <S%H2151>glutton<s%> shall come to <S%H3423>poverty:<s%> and <S%H5124>drowsiness<s%> shall <S%H3847>clothe<s%> a man with <S%H7168>rags.<s%>
Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> thee, and <S%H936>despise<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> she is <S%H2204>old.<s%>
Buy <S%H7069><s%> the <S%H571>truth,<s%> and <S%H4376>sell<s%> it <S%H408>not;<s%> also <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
The <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall greatly <S%H1523>rejoice:<s%> <S%H1523><s%> and he that <S%H3205>begetteth<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> child shall have <S%H8055>joy<s%> of him.
Thy <S%H1>father<s%> and thy <S%H517>mother<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> and she that <S%H3205>bore<s%> thee shall <S%H1523>rejoice.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me thine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and let thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5341>observe<s%> my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H2181>whore<s%> is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>ditch;<s%> and a <S%H5237>strange<s%> woman is a <S%H6862>narrow<s%> <S%H875>pit.<s%>
She <S%H1931><s%> <S%H637>also<s%> lieth in <S%H693>wait<s%> as for a <S%H2863>prey,<s%> and <S%H3254>increaseth<s%> the <S%H898>transgressors<s%> among <S%H120>men.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> hath <S%H188>woe?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H17>sorrow?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H4079>contentions?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H7879>babbling?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H6482>wounds<s%> without <S%H2600>cause?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H2448>redness<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>
They that tarry <S%H309>long<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H3196>wine;<s%> they that <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H2713>seek<s%> mixed <S%H4469>wine.<s%>

Look <S%H7200><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou upon the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it is <S%H119>red,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H5414>giveth<s%> his <S%H5869>color<s%> in the <S%H3563>cup,<s%> when it moveth <S%H1980>itself<s%> <S%H4339>aright.<s%>
At the <S%H319>last<s%> it <S%H5391>biteth<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> and <S%H6567>stingeth<s%> like an <S%H6848>adder.<s%>
Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> strange <S%H2114>women,<s%> and thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1696>utter<s%> perverse <S%H8419>things.<s%>

Yea, thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> as he that lieth <S%H7901>down<s%> in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> or as he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2260>mast.<s%>

They have <S%H5221>stricken<s%> me, shalt thou say, and I was <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H2470>sick;<s%> they have <S%H1986>beaten<s%> me, and I <S%H3045>felt<s%> it <S%H1077>not:<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H6974>awake?<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> it <S%H3254>yet<s%> <S%H5750>again.<s%>
